# dynar

Import dynare output result file into R

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

## Usage

This is a basic example which shows you how to import a "*_results.mat" file

```{r example, message=FALSE}
library(dynar)


model <- mat2r("inst/main_basic_results.mat")


str(model, 1)
```
